Package ktt.lib.httpserver

Class SimpleHttpHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • ktt.lib.httpserver.SimpleHttpHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpHandler, SimpleHttpExchangeAuthenticator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileHandler, PredicateHandler, RedirectHandler
    public abstract class SimpleHttpHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpHandler, SimpleHttpExchangeAuthenticator
    A simplified implementation of HttpHandler. It is used to process SimpleHttpExchanges. Each handler is its own thread and will not reveal any exceptions unless a try-catch within the handler is used.
    Since:
    02.00.00
    Version:
    02.00.00
    Author:
    Ktt Development
    See Also:
    HttpHandler, SimpleHttpExchange
